verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Maskil of the sons of Korah.) As the <S%H354>deer<s%> <S%H6165>pants<s%> for the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H650>brooks,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6165>pants<s%> for Thee, O <S%H430>God.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsts<s%> for <S%H430>God,<s%> for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> <S%H4970>When<s%> shall I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>?

My <S%H1832>tears<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> While [they] <S%H559>say<s%> to me <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long, <S%H346>"Where<s%> is your <S%H430>God<s%>?"

<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> I <S%H2142>remember,<s%> and I <S%H8210>pour<s%> out my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me. For I used to <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>along<s%> with the <S%H5519>throng<s%> [and] <S%H1718>lead<s%> them in <S%H1718>procession<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> With the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>joy<s%> and <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H2287>keeping<s%> <S%H2287>festival.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> are you in <S%H7817>despair,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? And [why] have you <S%H1993>become<s%> <S%H1993>disturbed<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me? <S%H3176>Hope<s%> in <S%H430>God,<s%> for I shall <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> Him [For] the <S%H3444>help<s%> of His <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

O my <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is in <S%H7817>despair<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me; <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H2142>remember<s%> Thee from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> And the peaks of <S%H2769>Hermon,<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H4706>Mizar.<s%>

<S%H8415>Deep<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> to <S%H8415>deep<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of Thy <S%H6794>waterfalls;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> Thy <S%H4867>breakers<s%> and Thy <S%H1530>waves<s%> have <S%H5674>rolled<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime;<s%> And His <S%H7892>song<s%> will be with me in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> A <S%H8605>prayer<s%> to the <S%H410>God<s%> of my <S%H9132>life.<s%>

I will <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H5553>rock,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> hast Thou <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me? <S%H4100>Why<s%> do I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H340>enemy<s%>?"

As a <S%H7524>shattering<s%> of my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> my <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> <S%H2778>revile<s%> me, While they <S%H559>say<s%> to me <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long, <S%H346>"Where<s%> is your <S%H430>God<s%>?"

<S%H4100>Why<s%> are you in <S%H7817>despair,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? And <S%H4100>why<s%> have you <S%H1993>become<s%> <S%H1993>disturbed<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me? <S%H3176>Hope<s%> in <S%H430>God,<s%> for I shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> Him, The <S%H3444>help<s%> of my <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
